title: Bloomberg Markets: Zaleski on Juicero’s Demise
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Zaleski on Juicero’s Demise
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Olivia Zaleski Technology Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing how Juicero went from prized starup to fire sale. ts collapse was the consequence of unsustainable costs, unflattering headlines and a bungled product launch.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
